name: Company Profile Management
description: Enable users to create, view, and edit detailed company profiles with comprehensive business information.

prd.problemStatement: Sales teams currently lack a centralized location to store and access comprehensive company information, leading to scattered data across multiple systems and inefficient prospect research.
goals: Provide a unified view of all company information in one location
Enable quick updates to company data by any team member
Improve data quality and completeness of company records

successMetrics.target: 85% of active companies have 80%+ fields filled

inScope: Create company profiles with core business information
Track company size, industry, and location data
outOfScope: Company logo management (handled by media module)

userStories: As a sales rep, I want to create comprehensive company profiles so that I can track all relevant business information in one place
As a manager, I want to view complete company information so that I can quickly assess account potential
dependencies: User authentication system must be complete
Database schema for company entities must be finalized
